virtual flyBspObject* fire (flyVector &p, flyVector &dir, float v, int playerid, flyBspObject *o=0)
 Fires the laser from the given position with the given direction and velocity.

void init ()
 Members initialisation function, is called upon activating the object.

int step (int dt)
 State update function, is called once per frame, moves the laser projectile, releases sprites and animates them.

void draw ()
 OpenGL drawing function, is called whenever the engine's camera can see the object, draws the laser projectile.

Public Attributes

float sizetexture
 the size of the largest texture between the side and front textures.

int sidetexture
 texture for viewing the projectile from the side.

int fronttexture
 texture for viewing the projectile by front.

hitmark* hm
 hitmark layed on walls by the projectile.

light* l
 light carried with the projectile.

sprite_light* s
 a sprite released periodically by the projectile when flying.

float sfact
 frequence in which the sprite is released.

float srfact
 variation in the sprite's scale (for growing or shrinking sprites).

float srvel
 radial velocity of the sprite (for spiraling sprites).

int numbounces
 the number of times the laser projectile can bounce on walls and surfaces.

followpath* path
 a followpath object that follows the flying laser.

Detailed Description

Laser projectile class.

This class implements a laser projectile, i.e. a projectile made of energy and implemented with sprites.

Fly3D Game Engine ver 2.0 - http://www.fly3d.com.br
